member.name: IMFMediaEngineEx.ApplyStreamSelections
member.summary: Applies the stream selections from previous calls to .
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IMFMediaEngineEx.CancelTimelineMarkerTimer
member.summary: Cancels the next pending timeline marker.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IMFMediaEngineEx.EnableHorizontalMirrorMode
member.summary: Enables or disables mirroring of the video.
member.param: If TRUE, the video is mirrored horizontally. Otherwise, the video is displayed normally.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IMFMediaEngineEx.EnableTimeUpdateTimer
member.summary: Enables or disables the time update timer.
member.param: If TRUE, the update timer is enabled. Otherwise, the timer is disabled.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IMFMediaEngineEx.EnableWindowlessSwapchainMode
member.summary: Enables or disables windowless swap-chain mode.
member.param: If TRUE, windowless swap-chain mode is enabled.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IMFMediaEngineEx.FrameStep
member.summary: Steps forward or backward one frame.
member.param: Specify TRUE to step forward or FALSE to step backward.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IMFMediaEngineEx.GetAudioEndpointRole
member.summary: Gets the audio device endpoint role used for the next call to or .
member.param: Receives the audio endpoint role.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IMFMediaEngineEx.GetAudioStreamCategory
member.summary: Gets the audio stream category used for the next call to or .
member.param: Receives the audio stream category.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IMFMediaEngineEx.GetBalance
member.summary: Gets the audio balance.

returns.para: Returns the balance. The value can be any number in the following range (inclusive).

listheader.description: The left channel is at full volume; the right channel is silent.
The right channel is at full volume; the left channel is silent.

returns.para: If the value is zero, the left and right channels are at equal volumes. The default value is zero.

member.name: IMFMediaEngineEx.GetNumberOfStreams
member.summary: Gets the number of streams in the media resource.
member.param: Receives the number of streams.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IMFMediaEngineEx.GetPresentationAttribute
member.summary: Gets a presentation attribute from the media resource.

param.name: guidMFAttribute
param.para: For a list of presentation attributes, see Presentation Descriptor Attributes.

member.param: A pointer to a that receives the value. The method fills the PROPVARIANT with a copy of the stored value. The caller must free the PROPVARIANT by calling .
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IMFMediaEngineEx.GetRealTimeMode
member.summary: Gets the real time mode used for the next call to or .
member.param: Receives the real time mode.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IMFMediaEngineEx.GetResourceCharacteristics
member.summary: Gets various flags that describe the media resource.
member.param: Receives a bitwise OR of zero or more flags from the .
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IMFMediaEngineEx.GetStatistics
member.summary: Gets a playback statistic from the Media Engine.
member.param: A member of the enumeration that identifies the statistic to get.
A pointer to a that receives the statistic. The data type and meaning of this value depends on the value of StatisticID. The caller must free the PROPVARIANT by calling .
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IMFMediaEngineEx.GetStereo3DFramePackingMode
member.summary: For stereoscopic 3D video, gets the layout of the two views within a video frame.
member.param: Receives a member of the enumeration.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IMFMediaEngineEx.GetStereo3DRenderMode
member.summary: For stereoscopic 3D video, queries how the Media Engine renders the 3D video content.
member.param: Receives a member of the enumeration.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IMFMediaEngineEx.GetStreamAttribute
member.summary: Gets a stream-level attribute from the media resource.
member.param: The zero-based index of the stream. To get the number of streams, call .

param.name: guidMFAttribute
param.para: The attribute to query. Possible values are listed in the following topics:

member.param: A pointer to a that receives the value. The method fills the PROPVARIANT with a copy of the stored value. Call to free the memory allocated by the method.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IMFMediaEngineEx.GetStreamSelection
member.summary: Queries whether a stream is selected to play.
member.param: The zero-based index of the stream. To get the number of streams, call .

listheader.description: The stream is selected. During playback, this stream will play.
The stream is not selected. During playback, this stream will not play.

member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IMFMediaEngineEx.GetTimelineMarkerTimer
member.summary: Gets the time of the next timeline marker, if any.
member.param: Receives the marker time, in seconds. If no marker is set, this parameter receives the value NaN.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IMFMediaEngineEx.GetVideoSwapchainHandle
member.summary: Gets a handle to the windowless swap chain.
member.param: Receives a handle to the swap chain.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IMFMediaEngineEx.InsertAudioEffect
member.summary: Inserts an audio effect.

item.description: A pointer to the interface of a Media Foundation transform (MFT) that implements the audio effect.
A pointer to the interface of an activation object. The activation object must create an MFT for the audio effect.

param.name: fOptional
param.para: Specifies whether the effect is optional.

listheader.description: The effect is optional. If the Media Engine cannot add the effect, it ignores the effect and continues playback.
The effect is required. If the Media Engine object cannot add the effect, a playback error occurs.

returns.para: This method can return one of these values.

listheader.description: The maximum number of audio effects was reached.

member.name: IMFMediaEngineEx.InsertVideoEffect
member.summary: Inserts a video effect.

item.description: A pointer to the interface of a Media Foundation transform (MFT) that implements the video effect.
A pointer to the interface of an activation object. The activation object must create an MFT for the video effect.

param.name: fOptional
param.para: Specifies whether the effect is optional.

listheader.description: The effect is optional. If the Media Engine cannot add the effect, it ignores the effect and continues playback.
The effect is required. If the Media Engine object cannot add the effect, a playback error occurs.

returns.para: This method can return one of these values.

listheader.description: The maximum number of video effects was reached.

member.name: IMFMediaEngineEx.IsPlaybackRateSupported
member.summary: Queries whether the Media Engine can play at a specified playback rate.
member.param: The requested playback rate.
member.returns: Returns TRUE if the playback rate is supported, or FALSE otherwise.

member.name: IMFMediaEngineEx.IsProtected
member.summary: Queries whether the media resource contains protected content.
member.param: Receives the value TRUE if the media resource contains protected content, or FALSE otherwise.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IMFMediaEngineEx.IsStereo3D
member.summary: Queries whether the media resource contains stereoscopic 3D video.
member.returns: Returns TRUE if the media resource contains 3D video, or FALSE otherwise.

member.name: IMFMediaEngineEx.RemoveAllEffects
member.summary: Removes all audio and video effects.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IMFMediaEngineEx.SetAudioEndpointRole
member.summary: Sets the audio device endpoint used for the next call to or .
member.param: Specifies the audio end point role.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IMFMediaEngineEx.SetAudioStreamCategory
member.summary: Sets the audio stream category for the next call to or .
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IMFMediaEngineEx.SetBalance
member.summary: Sets the audio balance.

param.name: balance
param.para: The audio balance. The value can be any number in the following range (inclusive).

listheader.description: The left channel is at full volume; the right channel is silent.
The right channel is at full volume; the left channel is silent.

param.para: If the value is zero, the left and right channels are at equal volumes. The default value is zero.

member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IMFMediaEngineEx.SetCurrentTimeEx
member.summary: Seeks to a new playback position using the specified .
member.param: The new playback position, in seconds.
Specifies if the seek is a normal seek or an approximate seek.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IMFMediaEngineEx.SetRealTimeMode
member.summary: Sets the real time mode used for the next call to or .
member.param: Specifies the real time mode.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IMFMediaEngineEx.SetSourceFromByteStream
member.summary: Opens a media resource from a byte stream.
member.param: A pointer to the interface of the byte stream.
The URL of the byte stream.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IMFMediaEngineEx.SetStereo3DFramePackingMode
member.summary: For stereoscopic 3D video, sets the layout of the two views within a video frame.
member.param: A member of the enumeration that specifies the layout. The two views can be arranged side-by-side, or top-to-bottom.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IMFMediaEngineEx.SetStereo3DRenderMode
member.summary: For stereoscopic 3D video, specifies how the Media Engine renders the 3D video content.
member.param: A member of the enumeration that specifies the 3D video rendering mode.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IMFMediaEngineEx.SetStreamSelection
member.summary: Selects or deselects a stream for playback.
member.param: The zero-based index of the stream. To get the number of streams, call .

param.name: Enabled
param.para: Specifies whether to select or deselect the stream.

listheader.description: The stream is selected. During playback, this stream will play.
The stream is not selected. During playback, this stream will not play.

member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IMFMediaEngineEx.SetTimelineMarkerTimer
member.summary: Specifies a presentation time when the Media Engine will send a marker event.
member.param: The presentation time for the marker event, in seconds.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IMFMediaEngineEx.UpdateVideoStream
member.summary: Updates the source rectangle, destination rectangle, and border color for the video.
member.param: A pointer to an structure that specifies the source rectangle. The source rectangle defines the area of the video frame that is displayed. If this parameter is NULL, the entire video frame is displayed.
A pointer to a structure that specifies the destination rectangle. The destination rectangle defines the area of the window or DirectComposition visual where the video is drawn.
A pointer to an structure that specifies the border color.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IMFMediaEngineEx
member.summary: Extends the interface.
